## createTocStore() function

create a idiomatic svelte store to use with `toc` action

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createTocStore(): import("svelte/store").Writable<TocStoreValue>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

import("svelte/store").Writable&lt;[TocStoreValue](./toc.tocstorevalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example

\`\`\`<!-- -->html <script lang="ts"> import { toc, createTocStore } from '<!-- -->@<!-- -->svelte-put/clickoutside';

const tocStore = createTocStore();

$: { const { activeItem, items } = $tocStore; console.log('all extracted toc items', items); console.log('activeItem', activeItem); // only if `observer: true` } </script>

&lt;<!-- -->main use:toc=<!-- -->{<!-- -->{ store: tocStore, observe: true }<!-- -->}<!-- -->&gt;<!-- -->...<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->/main
